titleStmt.title: A copy of a letter to the Lord Major of York dated Whitehall July 29. 1696.
titleStmt.author: Lowndes, William, 1652-1724.

notesStmt.note: Concerns alegations that Alderman Thompsom of York had misappropriated £600 intended for distribution to the poor of that city.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
